rows.label: qst103101_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmm... you all are a truly
curious combination.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0002
rows.name:
One that seems to break down the
barriers between nations...

rows.label: qst103101_msg0003
rows.name: Perhaps it is worth speaking to you.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0004
rows.name:
My name is Hassane. I am researching
the ancient Nopon tribe.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0005
rows.name:
There are murals they left
behind in various places.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0006
rows.name:
It seems a mural was also
left in Invidia, and I wish
to go investigate it, but...

rows.label: qst103101_msg0007
rows.name:
You know, don't you? The relationship
between Superbia and Invidia...

rows.label: qst103101_msg0008
rows.name:
If a researcher like myself were to go
to Invidia to investigate now, it would
be seen as an act of espionage.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0009
rows.name:
I do not mind facing some
danger myself for the sake
of my research, but...

rows.label: qst103101_msg0010
rows.name:
If I were to travel through official
channels, it might worsen relations...
I wish to avoid that.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0011
rows.name:
If I were just ten years younger,
I would sneak aboard a merchant
ship and slip into Invidia...

rows.label: qst103101_msg0012
rows.name:
Mmm... But this could
also put you in danger.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0013
rows.name:
Hmm, you have good eyes. I
will entrust this to you.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0015
rows.name:
Ho... I see. Together
with your companions...

rows.label: qst103101_msg0016
rows.name:
I understand! I shall disguise
myself as an elderly servant
and accompany you.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0017
rows.name:
To avoid suspicion, do not
hesitate. Give me any order,
be it a chore or anything else.
